00012 #ifndef H_WIDTH_H_

00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Utility functions to evaluate the standard model Higgs decay width due to   *
00017  * off-shell vector bosons. A small Monte Carlo is evaluated up to some aimed  *
00018  * precision.                                                                  *
00019  *                                                                             *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <Camgen/Breit_Wigner.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/ps_vol.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/stdrand.h>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00031     
00032     template<class value_type>value_type offshell_VV_width(std::complex<value_type>& ymc,const value_type& mh,const value_type& m1,const value_type& w1,const value_type& m2,const value_type& w2,const value_type& eps=0.01)
00033     {
00034         value_type mw1=m1*w1;
00035         value_type mw12=mw1*mw1;
00036         value_type m12=m1*m1;
00037         value_type mw2=m2*w2;
00038         value_type mw22=mw2*mw2;
00039         value_type m22=m2*m2;
00040         value_type mh2=mh*mh;
00041         BW_s_generator<value_type,std::random>gen1(&m1,&w1),gen2(&m2,&w2);
00042         gen1.set_m_range(0,mh);
00043         gen2.set_m_range(0,mh);
00044         const value_type& s1=gen1.s();
00045         const value_type& s2=gen2.s();
00046         value_type wght(0),wsum(0),w2sum(0),err(1);
00047         std::size_t N=0,n=0;
00048         do
00049         {
00050             bool q,q1,q2;
00051             n=0;
00052             do
00053             {
00054                 q1=gen1.generate();
00055                 q2=gen2.generate();
00056                 q=(q1 and q2 and (std::sqrt(s1)+std::sqrt(s2)<=mh));
00057                 ++n;
00058             }
00059             while(!q and (n<max_s_pairs()));
00060             if(!q)
00061             {
00062                 continue;
00063             }
00064             else
00065             {
00066                 ++N;
00067                 value_type num=((value_type)2+std::pow(mh2-s1-s2,(int)2)/(4*m12*m22))*std::sqrt(Kallen(mh2,s1,s2));
00068                 value_type denom=(std::pow(s1-m12,(int)2)+mw12)*(std::pow(s2-m22,(int)2)+mw22);
00069                 wght=integrate(&gen1,&gen2,mh)*gen1.weight()*gen2.weight()*num/denom;
00070                 wsum+=wght;
00071                 w2sum+=(wght*wght);
00072             }
00073             err=(wsum==0 or N<2)?1:(std::sqrt(w2sum-wsum*wsum/N)/wsum);
00074         }
00075         while(err>eps);
00076         value_type pi=std::acos(-(value_type)1);
00077         return mw1*mw2*std::norm(ymc)*(wsum/N)/std::pow(2*pi*mh,(int)3);
00078     }

00081 
00082     template<class model_type>typename model_type::value_type Gamma_H_ff(const typename model_type::value_type& eps=0.01)
00083     {
00084         typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00085         value_type result(0);
00086         value_type MH=model_type::M_h0;
00087         value_type ml[3]={model_type::M_e,model_type::M_mu,model_type::M_tau};
00088         value_type pi=std::acos(-(value_type)1);
00089         value_type prefactor=model_type::G_F*MH/(std::sqrt((value_type)2)*(value_type)4*pi);
00090         for(int i=0;i<3;++i)
00091         {
00092             if(ml[i]>(value_type)0 and ml[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00093             {
00094                 result+=prefactor*ml[i]*ml[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*ml[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00095             }
00096         }
00097         value_type mq[6]={model_type::M_d,model_type::M_u,model_type::M_s,model_type::M_c,model_type::M_b,model_type::M_t};
00098         prefactor*=(model_type::N_c);
00099         for(int i=0;i<6;++i)
00100         {
00101             if(mq[i]>(value_type)0 and mq[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00102             {
00103                 result+=prefactor*mq[i]*mq[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*mq[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00104             }
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00109 
00110     template<class model_type>typename model_type::value_type Gamma_H_VV(const typename model_type::value_type& eps=0.01)
00111     {
00112         typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00113         value_type result(0);
00114         result+=offshell_VV_width(model_type::hWW,model_type::M_h0,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,eps);
00115         result+=(0.5*offshell_VV_width(model_type::hZZ,model_type::M_h0,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,eps));
00116         return result;
00117     }
00118 
00119     template<class value_type>class H_branchings
00120     {
00121         public:
00122 
00123             value_type M_h0;
00124             value_type W_h0;
00125 
00126             value_type Br_l[3];
00127             value_type Br_q[6];
00128             value_type Br_W,Br_Z;
00129 
00130             H_branchings():M_h0(0),W_h0(0),Br_W(0),Br_Z(0)
00131             {
00132                 for(int i=0;i<3;++i)
00133                 {
00134                     Br_l[i]=(value_type)0;
00135                 }
00136                 for(int i=0;i<6;++i)
00137                 {
00138                     Br_q[i]=(value_type)0;
00139                 }
00140             }
00141     };
00142 
00145 
00146     template<class model_type>H_branchings<typename model_type::value_type>Gamma_H(const typename model_type::value_type& eps=0.01)
00147     {
00148         typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00149         H_branchings<value_type>result;
00150         value_type MH=model_type::M_h0;
00151         result.M_h0=MH;
00152 
00153         value_type ml[3]={model_type::M_e,model_type::M_mu,model_type::M_tau};
00154         value_type pi=std::acos(-(value_type)1);
00155         value_type prefactor=model_type::G_F*MH/(std::sqrt((value_type)2)*(value_type)4*pi);
00156         for(int i=0;i<3;++i)
00157         {
00158             if(ml[i]>(value_type)0 and ml[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00159             {
00160                 result.Br_l[i]=prefactor*ml[i]*ml[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*ml[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00161                 result.W_h0+=(result.Br_l[i]);
00162             }
00163         }
00164         value_type mq[6]={model_type::M_d,model_type::M_u,model_type::M_s,model_type::M_c,model_type::M_b,model_type::M_t};
00165         prefactor*=(model_type::N_c);
00166         for(int i=0;i<6;++i)
00167         {
00168             if(mq[i]>(value_type)0 and mq[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00169             {
00170                 result.Br_q[i]+=prefactor*mq[i]*mq[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*mq[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00171                 result.W_h0+=(result.Br_q[i]);
00172             }
00173         }
00174         result.Br_W=offshell_VV_width(model_type::hWW,MH,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,eps);
00175         result.W_h0+=result.Br_W;
00176         result.Br_Z=(0.5*offshell_VV_width(model_type::hZZ,MH,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,eps));
00177         result.W_h0+=result.Br_Z;
00178         for(int i=0;i<3;++i)
00179         {
00180             result.Br_l[i]/=result.W_h0;
00181         }
00182         for(int i=0;i<6;++i)
00183         {
00184             result.Br_q[i]/=result.W_h0;
00185         }
00186         result.Br_W/=result.W_h0;
00187         result.Br_Z/=result.W_h0;
00188         return result;
00189     }

00194     template<class model_type>typename model_type::value_type evaluate_Higgs_width(const typename model_type::value_type& eps=0.01)
00195     {
00196         typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00197         model_type::W_h0=(value_type)0;
00198         value_type MH=model_type::M_h0;
00199         value_type ml[3]={model_type::M_e,model_type::M_mu,model_type::M_tau};
00200         value_type pi=std::acos(-(value_type)1);
00201         value_type prefactor=model_type::G_F*MH/(std::sqrt((value_type)2)*(value_type)4*pi);
00202         for(int i=0;i<3;++i)
00203         {
00204             if(ml[i]>(value_type)0 and ml[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00205             {
00206                 model_type::W_h0+=prefactor*ml[i]*ml[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*ml[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00207             }
00208         }
00209         value_type mq[6]={model_type::M_d,model_type::M_u,model_type::M_s,model_type::M_c,model_type::M_b,model_type::M_t};
00210         prefactor*=(model_type::N_c);
00211         for(int i=0;i<6;++i)
00212         {
00213             if(mq[i]>(value_type)0 and mq[i]<=(value_type)0.5*MH)
00214             {
00215                 model_type::W_h0+=prefactor*mq[i]*mq[i]*std::pow((value_type)1-std::pow(2*mq[i]/MH,(int)2),(value_type)1.5);
00216             }
00217         }
00218         model_type::W_h0+=offshell_VV_width(model_type::hWW,MH,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,model_type::M_W,model_type::W_W,eps);
00219         model_type::W_h0+=(0.5*offshell_VV_width(model_type::hZZ,MH,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,model_type::M_Z,model_type::W_Z,eps));
00220         return model_type::W_h0;
00221     }
